properties.entry: SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) WHERE LOCAL_NAME=? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 1
UPDATE PLACE SET PLACE_COUNT = PLACE_COUNT +1 WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
SELECT AT_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO= ? AND FILE_TYPE = 2

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,PLACE_SUB_INFO ,PLACE_SIZE ,PARKING_YN ,PLACE_DATE ,PLACE_START_TIME ,PLACE_END_TIME ,MAX_CAPACITY ,CATEGORY_NAME FROM PLACE P LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO=? AND CATEGORY_NO = 1
SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) JOIN RESERVATION R USING(PLACE_NO) WHERE TIME_NO = ?

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM ( SELECT PLACE_NO, PLACE_NAME, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON (PLACE_NO = REF_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY PLACE_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8
INSERT INTO PLAYER VALUES(SEQ_PLAYER.NEXTVAL, ?, (SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE TIME_NO = ? AND PLACE_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/DD')), DEFAULT )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND FILE_TYPE=2 )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLAYER P JOIN RESERVATION R USING(RESERVATION_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO=? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/dd') AND TIME_NO=? AND FIXED_YN='Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLAYER WHERE USER_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_NO IN (SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE TIME_NO = ? AND PLACE_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/DD') AND FIXED_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLAYER WHERE PLAYER_NO = (SELECT PLAYER_NO FROM PLAYER JOIN RESERVATION USING(RESERVATION_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TIME_NO = ? AND FIXED_YN = 'Y')
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE WHERE LOCAL_NAME = '서울' AND CATEGORY_NO=1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) WHERE LOCAL_NAME= ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND FILE_TYPE=2 )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE WHERE LOCAL_NAME = '경기' AND CATEGORY_NO=1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) WHERE LOCAL_NAME= ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND FILE_TYPE=2 )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM ( SELECT PLACE_NO, PLACE_NAME, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON (PLACE_NO = REF_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 2 ORDER BY PLACE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 2 AND FILE_TYPE=2 )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 2
UPDATE PLACE SET PLACE_COUNT = PLACE_COUNT +1 WHERE PLACE_NO = ?

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,PLACE_SUB_INFO ,PLACE_SIZE ,PARKING_YN ,PLACE_DATE ,PLACE_START_TIME ,PLACE_END_TIME ,MAX_CAPACITY ,CATEGORY_NAME FROM PLACE P LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO=? AND CATEGORY_NO = 2 AND FILE_TYPE=2
SELECT AT_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO= ? AND FILE_TYPE = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLAYER P JOIN RESERVATION R USING(RESERVATION_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO=? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/dd') AND TIME_NO=? AND FIXED_YN='Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLAYER WHERE USER_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_NO IN (SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE TIME_NO = ? AND PLACE_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/DD') AND FIXED_YN = 'Y' )
INSERT INTO PLAYER VALUES(SEQ_PLAYER.NEXTVAL, ?, (SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE TIME_NO = ? AND PLACE_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/DD')), DEFAULT )

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLAYER WHERE PLAYER_NO = (SELECT PLAYER_NO FROM PLAYER JOIN RESERVATION USING(RESERVATION_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TIME_NO = ? AND FIXED_YN = 'Y' )
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 2 AND LOCAL_NAME='서울'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) WHERE LOCAL_NAME= ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 2 AND FILE_TYPE=2 )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE WHERE LOCAL_NAME = '경기' AND CATEGORY_NO=2

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,CHANGE_NAME FROM PLACE P JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(PLACE_NO=REF_NO) WHERE LOCAL_NAME= ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND CATEGORY_NO = 2 AND FILE_TYPE=2 )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
